participant_1.background:
I love hanging out with my friends.
I sometimes spend too much money at the casino.
My mom is a palm reader in new orleans.
My favorite food is shrimp.

participant_2.background:
My dogs name is wonton.
I am still single at the age of 35.
I still have a thick accent so words like hippopotamus are difficult.
I came from japan to teach high school over 10 years ago.
I teach both japanese and drawing classes.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing great! I just got back from a trip to Japan.
Oh, that sounds amazing! I'm from Japan, so I'm always happy to hear about people visiting.
It was really great! I loved seeing all the different temples and shrines.
I'm glad you enjoyed it! There are so many beautiful places to see in Japan.
Yeah, I was really impressed. I also really liked the food.
The food is amazing! I'm sure you had some great sushi.
I did! I had some of the best sushi I've ever had.
That's awesome! I'm glad you enjoyed Japan.
Me too! I'm definitely going to go back again someday.
I hope you do! I'm sure you'll have an even better time next time.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
So, what do you do for fun?
I love hanging out with my friends, going to concerts, and playing video games.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love concerts too.
Me too! I've been to a lot of concerts in my life.
I've been to a few, but not as many as you.
Well, I've had a lot of time to go to concerts. I'm still in college, so I don't have a lot of responsibilities.
That's true. I'm 35 and I'm still single, so I have a lot of time to do whatever I want.
That's great! I'm glad you're enjoying your life.
I am! Thanks for talking to me. I'm really enjoying this conversation.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
